parsed.fixed_xml:
<file name="line_4.json">
  {
    "xml_string": "<ITEM><TEXT>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende B\u221a\u00bacher in gar geringem Prei\u221a\u00fc zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. <NOTE>das Eremplar in albo achthalben</NOTE> <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. \u221a\u2020 <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> <NOTE>und auff Schreib-papier</NOTE> <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE> <YEAR>1713</YEAR>. \u221a\u2020 <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Le\u221a\u00bachter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erkl\u221a\u00a7rung und Gebatt \u221a\u00baber den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. <NOTE>mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet</NOTE> <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> \u221a\u2020 <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> \u221a\u2020 <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete un\u221a\u00baberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> <NOTE>gr\u221a\u00bandlich vorgestellt \u221a\u00baber die Worte des 125. Pfalms</NOTE> <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. \u221a\u2020 <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></TEXT></ITEM>"
  }
</file>
parsed.explanation: Added a <TEXT> tag to wrap the introductory text. Added <NOTE> tags to encapsulate descriptive notes. Corrected the unclosed <PRIZE> tag in the last <BIBL> entry. Added \u221a\u2020 to missing price entries. Ensured consistent use of escape sequences for special characters.
